Course Outline.heading: FUNCTIONS
list: Advanced Functions:  Logical function- If Functions, Or & and functions Statistical / Mathematical Functions SUM, SUMIF, SUMIFS, COUNT, COUNTA, COUNTIF, AVERAGE, AVERAGEIF, MIN, MAX
